positions.title: MongoDB
positions.description:
• Organized, promoted, and managed events to generate demand for database tech company
• Grew annual conference–increased engagement by 40% and average unique open rate for emails by 33%, and drove 55 million impressions
• Wrote marketing communications–emails, blog posts, social media, and paid social ads
• Built HTML emails using Eloqua, posted social content using Sprinklr, maintained website using Uberflip, drove advocate marketing using Influitive
• Analyzed content feedback, event data, and Salesforce campaigns to strategize marketing sends, optimize messaging, and identify sales opportunities
